title: Someone Tell Me It’S A Dream!
alternative_title: Someone Tell Me It’s a Dream! ; Dare ka yumeda to itte kure!
status: Someone Tell Me It’s a Dream! ; Dare ka yumeda to itte kure!
description:
Description :
        Hoshikawa Sayo, a high school student who is worried about his short height, witnesses the scene where the girl he has a crush on gets rejected by the tall, handsome Mashiba. He challenges her to a contest, but loses every time...! Mashiba calls him "cute" which pis*** him off even more! Just as he thinks this, he starts having strange dreams where someone hugs him. What's more, the content of the dreams keeps escalating...!?
